title: EcoDistricts Protocol - The New Standard for Community Development
description: Get the EcoDistricts Protocol, The New Standard for Community Development
cleaned_text: To foster a new model of urban regeneration, EcoDistricts has created the Protocol: a comprehensive framework to guide urban and community development from planning to implementation. The Protocol is a powerful way to move projects from vision to reality, and puts equity, resilience and climate protection at the heart of every decision. [GET
